channel.title: Old School Yard - Memories
channel.description:
inspired somewhat by Black Gate move in dungeon world
what if you have a School Memory move when you go Unconscious in Dungeon World, Urban Shadows etc where its been awhile since you were at school.
Roll +Wisdom/Spirit 10+ = You have a fond memory from your school days that resurfaces. This makes you feel good and reminds you of a lesson learned that helps you now - describe it.
7-9 = A turbulent memory bubbles up from your school days. Either - You feel rested, but realise an old enemy / problem has resurfaced. - or You will receive Magic/Supernatural aid in the future, which is tied to your family or school.
6- = Your nightmares have become reality. They are coming back, just like they came when you were younger... who are they and what do they want?

item.title: Old School Yard - Memories
item.dc:creator: @SabineV5
item.description:
@SabineV5 wrote:

Cool idea! Though I would probably not tie it to a school yard, especially not for Dungeon World (not every character grew up in a strictly regulated school environment, I’d think).

Maybe call it Blast from the Past - that could still be school, but also could mean other things.
